skills.name: shadcn-svelte
skills.description: Expert guidance for shadcn-svelte, a Svelte 5 port of shadcn/ui. Use this skill when working with shadcn-svelte components, installing UI components via CLI, implementing forms with Superforms/Formsnap, adding dark mode with mode-watcher, creating data tables with TanStack Table, theming with Tailwind CSS v4 and OKLCH colors, or building custom component registries.
